resources.string: Langkawi is a very attractive tourist destination.
Melaka has a lot of Malay history.
Bukit Bendera is one of the popular places in Penang.
Cameron highland has a very extensive tea plantation.
The Petronas Twin Towers is the 11th tallest building in the world.
I visited the Leaning Tower in 2019 with my family.
Pangkor Island is the third largest island located in the state of Perak.
Aman Island is a small island.
Kota A Famosa is a popular place in Melaka.
Museum Negara is a big museum.
